reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's vintage style, with one noting it can be left unbuttoned for a sexier look, and appreciate its stretchy material that's not thin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for any occasion
items.body: Absolutely stunning and sophisticated- I wore this for my sons wedding and felt beautiful- The green is definitely as pictured- The fit amazing- The arms were not tight and actually were a little longer than I expected- As I was walking down the aisle I realized it was giving off a bit of sex appeal by showing a little legðŸ¤­ Read more
items.author: Angela Turrill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great vintage style!
items.body: This dress is gorgeous! Love the vintage style! The stretchy material is not thin and makes this a very comfortable dress to wear. Material is of great quality, size is accurate, cost is affordable Read more
items.author: A. Caples

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wearable and pretty
items.body: A very well made dress. Beautiful on. Thanks Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but youâ€™ll need to size up.
items.body: Super cute dress. Lower quality fabric but still really cute. Youâ€™ll need to size up. I wear a US size 4 and the small was WAY too small. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Perfect dress! Fits perfectly, material is nice with a little stretch. Not wrinkled even out of the package. Got it for a work Christmas party so will update with pics after. Perfect for the work party. I am 5â€™7â€ and I wish it was just a little shorter but works out wonderful. Read more
items.author: JBD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars STUNNER!! Hide them rolls in style lol
items.body: Many compliments - If you want to hide the extra bumps in the front this is your dress!! Black is the way to go tho. Even the blue one did not hide as good as the black dress. 170lb size Xl dress. Do it you wonâ€™t regret! Read more
items.author: E.M.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap Fabric
items.body: Dress is cute and I felt sexy in it but when I went to wear it for the first time, the side ripped as I was just adjustingit. It wasn't too small so the fabric is cheaper than expected. I'm outside of the return window so now I'm stuck with a defective dress Read more
items.author: Megan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine, Purpel, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
